mapper.insert: insert into flight_table(flightNumber, flightAirline, airplaneId, departureAirport, arrivalAirport, departureDate, arrivalDate, gateNumber, flightFare) values (#{flightNumber}, #{flightAirline}, #{airplaneId}, #{departureAirport}, #{arrivalAirport}, #{departureDate}, #{arrivalDate}, #{gateNumber}, #{flightFare})
mapper.update: update flight_table set flightNumber = #{flightNumber}, flightAirline = #{flightAirline}, airplaneId = #{airplaneId}, departureAirport = #{departureAirport}, arrivalAirport = #{arrivalAirport}, departureDate = #{departureDate}, arrivalDate = #{arrivalDate}, gateNumber = #{gateNumber}, flightFare = #{flightFare}, where id = #{id}
